name: I/O Extended live broadcast
description:
I/O is a three-day outdoor tech festival¬†

We’ll be taking over the Shoreline Amphitheatre with technical sessions, hands-on demos, Google experts. During a CodeLab you'll be learning how to add voice control to your mobile app.

What to expect
I/O features experiential learning, Google’s latest developer products, and talks from Google Product Managers & Engineers — plus a few surprises along the way.
